Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to a SQL database. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.debug   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.filters This package contains query filters for SQL queries used by the classes in the org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql package.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.handlers This package contains ResultSet handlers for SQL queries used by the classes in the org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql package.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.upgrade   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.transaction.sql   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging In-memory and persistent logging facilities.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web This package contains java beans and supporting classes for driving the web app ui. 
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
AeAbstractSQLStorage
          Base class for SQL storage objects that extract sql statement from AeSQLConfig object.
AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider
          An abstract storage provider implementation for SQL.
AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory
          Provides factory access to InvocationHandler impls.
AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeRestoreAutoCommitHandler
          Implements a method invocation handler that passes all method calls to an underlying JDBC connection but ensures that Connection.setAutoCommit(boolean) is set to true before Connection.close() is called.
AeDataSource
          Convenience class to centralize access to JDBC data sources.
AeDelegatingDataSource
          A delegating DataSource
AeQueryRunner.AeSQLNull
          Implements placeholders for typed null parameter values in prepared statements.
AeSQLConfig
          This class encapsulates the SQL statements used by the Active BPEL persistence layer.
AeSQLDatabaseType
          Implements a database type lookup from the database.
AeSQLJournalStorage
          A SQL journal storage.
AeSQLObject
          Base class for objects that access the database.
AeSQLVersion
          Implements database version lookup in the database.
